headline: Morgan Stanley Raises Stanley Black & Decker (SWK) Price Forecast, Cites Margin Recovery Potential
summary: Stanley Black & Decker, Inc. (NYSE:SWK) is included among the 14 Best Affordable Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On February 24, Morgan Stanley raised its price recommendation on Stanley Black & Decker, Inc. (NYSE:SWK) to $87 from $80. The firm kept an Equal Weight rating on the shares. The update followed the company’s […]
